name: Pig Pig Rocket
description:
Pig Pig Rocket is a Chu Chu Rocket remake. It's been a big project getting all the mechanics to work. The timing doesn't quite match the original and certain levels needed to be be adapted to suit. Which certainly isn't a bad thing. I believe it makes this remake unique and a new challenge. I hope you enjoy this release which boasts 75 fun and challenging levels. Can you save all the Piggies?

Made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5, (special thanks to Schrodinger for help with the Piggy AI).
